about_the_game:
Rooming with an 80s children's TV show host? It's more likely than you'd think. He's sweet. He's kind. And he's more than attentive. It's intoxicating. Something isn't right. It can't be, can it?

Something's Wrong With Sunny Day Jack is a Phantom of the Opera retelling with a twist- combining nostalgia, murder, and decadent romance to create a unique horror experience and an even more unusual dating sim/eroge. Navigate your relationships with three key figures in your life and investigate the truth behind the ghost(?) of the titular Sunny Day Jack, who's been haunting you ever since one fateful day...

Features

  • Gender-Neutral, Nameable Protagonist
  • A Mature Story With Many Paths
  • All Original Art
  • Fully Illustrated Erotic Scenes
  • Three Love Interests
  • Full English Voice Acting
  • ... And More!

Meet The Cast



Name: Sunny Day Jack
VA: NaughtyMaus
Likes: Chocolate Chip Cookies, Taking Care of Others, and You!
Dislikes: Being Alone

Who is he? Where did he come from? Nobody knows, but he claims to hail from a place called Cloudy Town.
Jack is ready to be your best friend until the end in the most literal sense. The only question is-- what to do about those pesky, inferior other friends of yours who came before him and now stand in his way?



Name: Shaun Durand-Cofer
VA: LewdZaxk
Likes: Peanut Butter Cups, Cats, Halloween, and Fishnets
Dislikes: Sleeping, Cucumbers, and Church

Your old college roomie, and the best friend that you've got at the moment.
Shaun jetted off, following the success of his romance-horror movie "Dearest Departed." Now, he's a successful director and writer, and a pioneer for the genre.
Shaun has a new movie he's been working on, but needs a bit of help. Maybe visiting you will inspire him?



Name: Ian Duff
VA: Ben Sinning
Likes: Manga, Fashion, Cinnamon Rolls, and Acting
Dislikes: Cold French Fries, Being Left Alone, and Loud Parties

He had you, until he lost you. Formerly your childhood friend, high school sweetheart, and your boyfriend, Ian has fallen from your good graces after admitting to cheating on you while attending performing arts school.
Nothing will stop him from proving his undying love for you, though. And this new job of his as the main character of an upcoming big budget TV show should do nicely as a fresh start for both your lives.

Content Warnings

In Something's Wrong With Sunny Day Jack, players can expect:

- [Sexual] Graphic sexual content (consenting/willing, romantic/seductive in nature.)
- [Nonsexual] Themes of past child abuse, living with childhood and past trauma, religious trauma, or general themes of religion.
- [Nonsexual] Violent imagery, themes of murder/homicide, themes of gore and blood.
- [Sexual, Romantic, Emotional] Yandere themes of possessiveness, desire, pursuit, obsessiveness, wanting, manipulation, and willingness to harm others in pursuit.
- [Romantic, Sexual, Emotional] Themes of manipulation, mind games, sexual consensual coercion, supernatural influence, soft dubious consent, and persuasive seduction.
- [Nonsexual] Psychological aspects, featuring heartfelt and emotional performances which may be disturbing to hear.
- [Nonsexual] Themes of workplace abuse, grief and loss, death and mourning, sexuality, trauma/PTSD, and tragedy.
- [Nonsexual] The threat of violence, themes of survival, and inset terror.
- [Nonsexual] Weapons, weapon violence, and use of weapons
- [Nonsexual and Sexual] Demonic possession, themes of supernatural demons and ghosts, themes of religion, themes of possession, the supernatural as an antagonist
- [Nonsexual] Emphasis on grief, death, mourning, and themes of mortality

What not to expect:

- Jumpscares and other aspects of horror which rely on sudden and alarming player discomfort.
- [Sexual, Nonsexual] Scenes of assault, reluctant/malicious/hard dubious consent, non-consent, or scenes with violent AND sexual themes intertwined. Anger, rage, or hate sex.
- Reference to sex-specific anatomy
- Harm to children in any way/shape/form. Inclusion of children within the story, cast, or characters.
- Yandere themes of harm to the player.
- Incest, or otherwise taboo relationships and dynamics.
- Age-play, or themes of mental regression.
- Somnophilia, incapacitated sex, intoxication during sex or intoxication in general.
- Portrayals of mental illness as an antagonistic threat, utilization of mental illness as a primary or thematic antagonist. (Psychosis, etc..)

All sexual content is intended as consensual, non-agressive, and mutually enjoyable in nature. There are no plans to utilize sexual scenarios for horror purposes. Blending supernatural elements with sexual scenarios is our intention, separate from the supernatural and horror portions.

content_descriptors.notes: Sunny Day Jack is a mature game contains both sexual content and story elements that may be considered disturbing to some players, and thus is not intended for minors. Examples of disturbing subject matter in the story include, but are not limited to: unreality, murder, emotional manipulation, domestic abuse, (entertainment) industry abuse.

name: Something's Wrong With Sunny Day Jack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Navigate your relationships and figure out the truth behind the ghost of a 80s children's TV show host who's been haunting you in this fully voiced R-18 visual novel filled with nostalgia, romance, and horror. Can everyone get their happily ever after?
